title: Audit trail
description: The audit trail schema indicates a data record is auditable. For example, who and when the record was last modified.

xdm:repositoryCreatedBy.title: Created by user identifier
xdm:repositoryCreatedBy.description: User ID of who created the record.

xdm:repositoryLastModifiedBy.title: Modified by user identifier
xdm:repositoryLastModifiedBy.description: User ID of who last modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByUser` is set as `createdByUser`.

xdm:createdByBatchID.title: Created by batch identifier
xdm:createdByBatchID.description: The dataset files in Catalog which has been originating the creation of the record.

xdm:modifiedByBatchID.title: Modified by batch identifier
xdm:modifiedByBatchID.description: The last dataset files in Catalog which has modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByBatchID` is set as `createdByBatchID`.
